title: My front camera is blur. I cleaned my lens, restarted, safemode ,updated apps. But it doesn't work
content: My front camera is blur. I tried restarting, cleaning, updating apps, safe mode too. But it just doesn't clear. I don't understand what to do. Its blur when I take my camera far from an object but when I bring it near to the object, it is very clear. How to fix this?
